title: Severn Trent logo font?
content:
This one’s killing me. I feel it’s going to be soooo obvious but I just can’t get it. Can anyone please put me out of my misery?

author: acejet170

comments.content:
This is off the Annual Report of the parent company.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905083532im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3556.jpg)
  
The only fonts mentioned in the PDF are EuroSans, Frutiger Bold and various weights of News Gothic
